topics.body:
I've had the shittiest and bestest day (disclaimer; yes I know that's not a word).

Short version is that:
Fuck no job; not job openings for the time being.
Might have found a good cheap online college and my mom has finally come around and accepted me being bi and trans for real; she got me a bunch of women's clothing and such for me to try.  Also I found good programming tutorials for C# and Java in the meantime while waiting for college.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
